thread.title: Kentucky takes the lead in Crystal Ball for Mohamed Bamba
thread.title_full: Kentucky takes the lead in Crystal Ball for Mohamed Bamba

title: Kentucky takes the lead in Crystal Ball for Mohamed Bamba
text:
Manage Kentucky takes the lead in Crystal Ball for Mohamed Bamba On the heels of his official visit last weekend, Kentucky has taken the lead in the 247Sports Crystal Ball for top uncommitted prospect Mohamed Bamba. Slot to Kentucky Links (Photo: Jon Lopez // Nike) 
On the heels of his official visit last weekend, Kentucky has taken the lead in the 247Sports Crystal Ball for Norristown (Pa.) Westtown School 5-star power forward Mohamed Bamba . 
Previously, his Crystal Ball was split down the middle between Duke and Kentucky, but the Wildcats have now claimed four of the last five picks and now represent 61 percent of the 18 predictions. 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER 
Bamba (6-11, 207), who is ranked No. 3 overall in the 2017 class by the 247Sports Composite , took an official visit to Lexington the weekend of Jan. 20. He will take his final official visit to Duke Feb. 26-28. 
Along with the Wildcats and Blue Devils, Bamba is also still considering Michigan and Texas. 
Bamba was recently named to both the 2017 McDonald's All-American Game and Jordan Brand Classic.
